articles.author: Anirudh Menon
articles.title: India vs Australia Live: score, updates, commentary from match 2 - ESPN - ESPN India
articles.description: The Indian men's hockey team takes on Australia in their second match of the Australia tour.
articles.content: The Indian men's hockey team now trail Australia 0-2 in their five match test series after Australia came from 1-2 down in the first half to take the game 4-2. You can relive all the action from the … [+16 chars]
